{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=HD |revision=(2500X) |asin=B007KEZMX4 |fcc_date=02/22/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC2R1001 |ic_id=5959A-2500X |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7208 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Roku HD (2500X) Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362;BCM43362KUBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM7208 @400MHz SoC *WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43362 SDIO: 0xA962 [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcmfmac]
This device is a wireless module in the '''Nintendo''' Wii U. :It is visible in [http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Nintendo+Wii+U+Teardown/11796/2 iFixit's teardown of the unit]. The full part number of the '''Broadcom''' chip is BCM43362KUBG.
===See also=== :[[Roku]] *[[Roku HD (2500X)]] / [[Roku HD (2500X) Wireless Module]] *[[Roku 2700X]] / [[Roku 2720X]]
